casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Calvin Steven BROOKS 212P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Mr. Dylan J. C. Buffum, Attorney at Law, Mr. Calvin Steven Brooks, for Brooks, Calvin Steven. Ms. Melissa H. Taylor, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*157The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of June 2017 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
